posts.description: Data Scientist Interview: Michal Migurski of Stamen | Metamarkets
posts.extended: .@MichalMigurski of @Stamen talks about the past and the future of data visualization  #maps #dataviz
Chris Ware's "Building Stories" is maybe the best $30 you can spend:  I don't know how they're turning a profit on it.
